alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 7:01PM MST until February 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Light snow has come to an end across the warned area and the Winter Storm Warning will be allowed to expire early. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Wyoming and western Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 to 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
